title: Prohibits individuals who are registered sex offenders from receiving sexual performance enhancing drugs through medicaid
summary: Prohibits individuals who are registered sex offenders from receiving sexual performance enhancing drugs through medicaid.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1063

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. ORTIZ, GABRYSZAK -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Health

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  social services law, in relation to restricting
         certain medications from coverage for Medicaid purposes

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision 4 of section 365-a of the social services law
    2  is amended by adding a new paragraph (h) to read as follows:
    3    (H) DRUGS USED TO ENHANCE THE SEXUAL PERFORMANCE OF  THEIR  USER  WHEN
    4  PRESCRIBED  FOR  USE  BY A PERSON WHO HAS PREVIOUSLY BEEN CONVICTED OF A
    5  FELONY.
    6    S 2. Subparagraph (v) of paragraph (e) of  subdivision  1  of  section
    7  369-ee  of the social services law, as amended by section 1 of part C of
    8  chapter 58 of the laws of 2008, is amended to read as follows:
    9    (v) prescription drugs as defined in section two  hundred  seventy  of
   10  the  public  health law, which shall be provided pursuant to subdivision
   11  two-b of this section, and non-prescription smoking  cessation  products
   12  or  devices;  PROVIDED,  HOWEVER, THAT DRUGS USED FOR THE ENHANCEMENT OF
   13  SEXUAL PERFORMANCE WHEN PRESCRIBED FOR USE BY A PERSON WHO HAS PREVIOUS-
   14  LY BEEN CONVICTED OF A FELONY  SHALL  NOT  BE  COVERED  BY  HEALTH  CARE
   15  SERVICES UNDER THIS TITLE;
   16    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03942-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to restricting certain medications from coverage for Medicaid purposes
